entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improvements for Delegate.GetHashCode() for CsWinRT (and NativeAOT) #96947
  • Inline array Equals unexpected behavior #96943
  • JIT should be able to elide zeroing of fields after allocations #96942
    9.0.0
  • Tiered miscompilation of Vector2.Dot(x, x) without SSE4.1 #96939
  • Stateless Managed->Unmanaged marshaller does call GetPinnableReference #96932

Closed

  • Precise liveness for LCL_FLD-s #49199
    Future
  • mono_install_marshal_callbacks is not reentrant? #96929
  • [monovm] Assertion at object.c:657, condition `lock->done' not met #96872
    8.0.x
  • Convert all FCalls with HELPER_METHOD_FRAME to QCalls #95695
    Future
  • CPU set affinity is not respected by ProcessorCount on Windows #94364
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • breaking a string on many lines produce incorrect result if followed by a call #96948
    area-System.CodeDom, community-contribution
  • Enable the gshared-mrgctx mode by default. #96946
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Disable load/store vector APIs until Mono adds support for it #96944
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable riscv64 R2R in installer #96941
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Update ConfigurationKeyNameAttribute.cs #96940
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • EventPipe: Don't clean up thread list on shutdown #96936
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix maintenance of `genReturnBB` pointer #96935
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JitDump and other minor improvements #96933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Avx512 support to ProbabilisticMap #96931
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • Fix assertion at BigInteger.TryParse(null, out _) #96930
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Improve TeddyHelper.RightShift helpers for ARM #96928
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Delete old DFS and dominator implementations #96927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove more helper frames by converting methods to QCalls #96926
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0

Merged

  • [mono][jit] Patch jump trampolines on amd64/arm64 after a method has … #96757
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #96388
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] GT_STORE_BLK - do not call memset for blocks containg gc pointers on heap #96514
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][debugger] Fix debug lazy loaded assemblies when webcil is enabled #96825
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.x
  • Comment out assert to workaround codegen bug #96877
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix class initialization spurious wakeups #96905
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • Remove uses of FCThrow in interlocked helpers #96916
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix nativeaot-outerloop #96906
    area-System.Linq

Updated

  • JIT: Pass field's owner to getFieldType #96794
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][debugger] fake bind_static_method #96899
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] 32-bit platform ObjWriter and bit rot fixes #96890
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Crossgen2 PDB generation (again) #96566
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Refine Bin/Hex parsing of BigInteger #95543
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Share unified UTF-8/16 parsing with BigInteger #95402
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • [IGNORE] Testing `Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0` PR #96459
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • Cse metrics #96880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move PendingTypeLoadTable from the ClassLoader object to a global structure #96653
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Re-add Stack Overflow handling in NativeAOT with larger alternate stack #95808
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95216
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.2
